definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
the whole world at peace (idiom); peace and prosperity
to pretend that everything is going well
Taiping district of Fuxin city 阜新市, Liaoning
COSCO Pacific Limited, major freight company
COSCO Pacific Limited, major freight company

sentences.english: If it is too flat, athletes will flip .
sentences.chinese: 如果太平，运动员将翻转。

sentences.english: The plane will fly across the Pacific Ocean.
The coastal desert occupies a long strip between the Pacific Ocean and the Andes Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 海岸荒漠占领长条状的之间的太平洋和安第斯山脉。

sentences.english: Step 6: If you cannot open the doors, look for an emergency exit window.
sentences.chinese: 如果无法打开紧急车门，则寻找太平门窗户。

sentences.english: Come, join us in the magic of the Pacific and the pageantry of its people.
sentences.chinese: 来吧，请加入我们太平洋的奇幻世界和壮观的人群。

sentences.english: Some of the big Singapore hotels here include the Marina Mandarin, The Oriental and Pan Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 一些大酒店新加坡这里包括滨华，东方和泛太平洋。

sentences.english: His 14-year-old sister, also from Thai Binh Province.
sentences.chinese: 他的14岁妹妹，也来自太平省。

sentences.english: Westpac Bank has recovered all but NZ$3.8 million.
sentences.chinese: 西太平洋银行仅挽回了380万新西兰元的损失。

sentences.english: This is the website for Department of Biology, Seattle Pacific University.
sentences.chinese: 这是西雅图太平洋大学生物学系的网站。

sentences.english: Its crew consisted of themselves and a boy to assist---truly a poor equipment with which to face a great and stormy ocean like the Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 这只装备简陋的小船，就要驶向太平洋的暴风雨了。

sentences.english: And new data on that record tell a disturbing story, especially in the northeastern Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 和新的记录着关于东北面太平洋版块波动的数据。

sentences.english: All of the nations in the pacific rim have been watching China's military developmen¬ts with alarm.
sentences.chinese: 太平洋沿岸国家已经注意到中国军力壮大的危险。

sentences.english: Mount Unzen is one of more than a thousand active volcanoes that circle the Pacific Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 云仙岳是千余座活火山这个圈子太平洋之一。

sentences.english: China borders on the Pacific Ocean.
Most Chinese-Americans live in cities on the Pacific and Atlantic coasts.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的美藉华人住在太平洋和大西洋沿岸的城市。

sentences.english: Finally he surmounts the Pacific Ocean to the west, and promised that one day also again to come back.
sentences.chinese: 最后他向西跨越太平洋，并许诺有一天还会再回来。

the country prospers, the people at peace (idiom); peace and prosperity
